messages.start: Greetings, {0}! My name is {1} and I can download the media from instagram. Just enter the reel url to download it. For more, info use /help
messages.help:
Help center Here you can see the most popular questions with answers. 1. I send the media url and get the message
Something went wrong! Please try again!
Possible problems: 1) The problem with media. Your media is too large to load. Try to download other media! 2) The problem on server side. Just wait until the problem is solved. We apologize in advance for this!
